Referenced by createIterativeClosestPoint().

IIterativeClosestPointPtr brics_3d::IterativeClosestPointFactory::createIterativeClosestPoint ( std::string  configurationFile)

Factory method the returns an IterativeClosestPoint configured by an XML file.

Wrong parameters descriptions in the XML file will be handled as warnings and the default parameter is chosen.

Parameters:
configurationFilePath to the XML configuration file
Returns:
Returns an instance of the abstract Iterative Closest Point interface


Example XML file:
<!DOCTYPE dummy>
<BRICS_3D-Configuration>

  <IterativeClosestPoint implementation="IterativeClosestPoint" maxiterations="25" convergencethreshold="0.001">
    <PointCorrespondence implementation="PointCorrespondenceKDTree"></PointCorrespondence>
    <RigidTransformationEstimation implementation="RigidTransformationEstimationSVD"></RigidTransformationEstimation>
  </IterativeClosestPoint>

</BRICS_3D-Configuration>

NOTE1: The current implementation of the ConfigurationFileHandlerTest configuration file parser bases on the Xerces library. If it is not installed the default configuration is choosen.

IIterativeClosestPointSetupPtr brics_3d::IterativeClosestPointFactory::getIcpSetupHandle ( )

Get an ICP setup handle, if available.

Returns:
Returns the handle to the IIterativeClosestPointSetup interface of the last invocation of createIterativeClosestPoint if available. Otherwise returns 0.
